mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, name, password, effective_from, effective_to, own_sign, region_sign

sql.where: is_delete = 'N' and own_sign = #{ownSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND effective_from >= #{effectiveFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND effective_to <= #{effectiveTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

mapper.select: select from user order by gmt_create desc limit #{pageFirstItem}, #{pageSize}
select from user order by gmt_create desc limit #{pageFirstItem}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into user (gmt_create, gmt_modified, name, password, effective_from, effective_to, own_sign, region_sign, is_delete, db_remark) values (now(), now(), #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ownSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', null)
insert into user(id, name, password) values (#{user.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
